question: The Orange Prize for Fiction is one of the United Kingdomâ€™s most prestigious literary prizes. Who among the following is eligible to receive this prize?
option1: female author of any nationality for the best original full-length novel written in English, and published in the United Kingdom
option2: male or female author of any nationality for the best original full-length novel written in English, and published in the United Kingdom
option3: female author of any nationality for the best original full-length novel written in English, and published in any country
answer: female author of any nationality for the best original full-length novel written in English, and published in the United Kingdom
